participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys fun activities and is focused on self-improvement.
participant_1.background: I like to tan in tanning beds. I love listening to Britney Spears. I diet a lot. I am high maintenance.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, looking forward to independence and enjoying life with friends.
participant_2.background: I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I work part-time at Burger King. They are constantly on my back. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I just want to have fun with my friends.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, go shopping, and go to concerts.
That sounds fun. I like to do some of those things too. I also like to go to the beach and play video games.
I love the beach! I don't get to go very often, but I always have a good time when I do. I've never been much of a gamer, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! There are so many great games out there. I'm sure you'd find one you like.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. What do you do for work?
I work part-time at Burger King. It's not my dream job, but it's a good way to make some money while I'm still in school.
I know what you mean. I'm still in school too. I work as a tutor for a tutoring company. It's not the most exciting job, but it's good money and it helps me keep my grades up.
That's cool. I'm glad you're able to find a job that works for you.
Thanks. Me too. So, how old are you?
I'm 19. I'm so ready to move out of my parents' house. They're constantly on my back about everything.
I can understand that. I'm 19 too, and I'm also ready to move out. My parents are nice, but they can be a little overbearing sometimes.
Yeah, I know what you mean. It's like they don't trust me to make my own decisions.
Exactly! It's like they think I'm still a kid.
I know, right? It's so annoying.
Well, I'm sure you'll be able to move out soon. Just hang in there.
Thanks. I'm trying.
So, what are you doing after school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to college, but I'm not sure what I want to study.
Well, you've got plenty of time to figure it out.
I know. I'm just not sure what I want to do with my life.
You'll figure it out. Just take your time and don't rush into anything.
